message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. This is my top price for the product. What do you think?

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product significantly exceeds your offer. I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000.  This is a significant concession on my part, reflecting my desire to make this deal work.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $1,900,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,400,000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
